Scene:
The Ouchi Mansion
(Ōuchi yakata / 大内館)

Play: The Priest Karukaya and the Souvenir of Tsukushi (苅萱桑門筑紫いえづと)

Production: September 1993



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seisuke (鶴澤清介)
